Microwave Oven Cooking: Use a microwave oven to cook food quickly and efficiently. This can be done by placing food in a microwave-safe dish and microwaving it for a short period of time.

Microwave Oven Heating: Use a microwave oven to heat up cold food or drinks quickly and easily. This can be done by placing the food or drink in a microwave-safe container and microwaving it for a short period of time.

Microwave Oven Sterilization: Use a microwave oven to sterilize items such as medical equipment or food containers. This can be done by placing the item in a microwave-safe container and microwaving it for a specific amount of time.

Microwave Oven Cleaning: Use a microwave oven to clean hard-to-clean items such as oven racks or grills. This can be done by placing the item in a microwave-safe container and microwaving it for a short period of of time.

Microwave Oven Drying: Use a microwave oven to dry items such as clothes or shoes quickly and efficiently. This can be done by placing the item in a microwave-safe container and microwaving it on a low heat setting for a short period of time.
